metadata.Title: CVE-2015-1083

Platform: SUSE Linux Enterprise Server for Raspberry Pi 12 SP2

metadata.Description: WebKit, as used in Apple Safari before 6.2.4, 7.x before 7.1.4, and 8.x before 8.0.4, allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code or cause a denial of service (memory corruption and application crash) via a crafted web site, a different vulnerability than other CVEs listed in APPLE-SA-2015-03-17-1.
